content.label: Sketchy at best. Feels like you are being ‘solicited’ at every turn. No way would I let a 9 year old play this... disappointing at best. Deleting app...it’s not fun, just frustrating.

Avoid unless you like constant loud pop-up ads for stupid games in-between each round of your Scrabble game.  

Also, the dictionary is pathetic.  “FART” and “YIDDISH” are words.  

Why does the game try to force me to log in through Facebook, when I have created my own log-in?

title.label: Please make a classic version - I promise I will pay for it!!!

content.label:
Where is the good old Scrabble?  I don’t need cartoons and treasure chests and jewels and ‘rewards’. Just the game. The classic game.

Please.

title.label: This game is bad and not for children

content.label:
Beside the fact that the algorithm used in this game is faulty and can give you all vowels over and over and over, the interface is so distracting that it is difficult to play the game. Even when I switched to classic play, I still get ads some of which are almost x-rated. I often get match requests which I decline, but I do not want some stranger reaching out to me. There is no way to turn this off. All of the requests are from men, which makes me suspicious that these are pedophiles out looking for a pick up. And sure enough, I read many reviews that have experienced someone trying to pick them up. I am ashamed and disgusted with Hasbro for not taking more care to produce and maintain a game that is more in line with the real thing. I want to only use Words with Friends, but my sister likes to play this game and she is the only one I play this with. I would pay for a game to give me a the ability to play clean without any interference and distractions, and from the reviews, it seems like other scrabble lovers feel the same way. There is just NO WAY that this game could possible have a rating higher than 4 when you see all of the low ratings. I’ve even tried to report this game to Apple but there is no button to do that for some reason.

*update - my sister finally consented to give up playing on this app after many games of deal after deal of all vowels or all consonants. 

PS- I thought I posted this on Thursday or Friday, but still don’t see this review in the App Store.

Fun game but way too many advertisements pop up after every place.  Game doesn’t refresh so it could take a day or two before you know it’s your turn.  Game just shuts off all of the time.  So many creepy men who message you.  I just ignore them.  I want the old game back!!!  It just disappears way too much

Hard to think of how they could have done more to run a perfectly good app. I have it one star because zero is not an option. I can only think the relatively high average rating is because it got the old (good) ratings from the old app this replaced. Get rid of all the graphics, video, and other crap and bring back the ability to pass and play with friends, as I liked to do with my child. 

And Apple should reset the ratings to get rid of all the old ratings so this gets the one star average this new version deserves.

Just avoid chat! Play for months before considering a chat. 
Keep Scrabble Go purer. Just Play!
Loved playing this game before but now after every single game there’s an ad unlike before when you used to see one every 4 games.
Not good
Too much going on

Before they changed it from just Scrabble to Scrabble Go I never watched a single ad. When I first updated I only had to watch an annoying repetitive ad about once every 3 or 4 turns after the last update I have to see them before every turn. It is also full of bugs and freezes regularly. SCREW Scrabble Go !!!!!!!!!!

I was playing a game with 2 of my grandchildren but had them stop. The ads for weight loss show scantily clothed people and are inappropriate. You would never see ads like this on tv. In general most of their ads look like they were produced by non professionals selling crap.

I just want a simple game to play with distant friends and family. This Scrabble is like the TV show on Idiocracy. It's constantly grabbing your attention with animations and colors. Here. Here. Here. I only want to be notified after my friend takes a turn, not anytime there's a new bot or ad. Do this. Open that. Click here. It's on crack. 

After getting past the annoying menu, the board game itself is fun and easy to control the tiles. I like being able to shuffle the tiles.

Like trying to play scrabble on the main floor of a cheap casino, or in a Chuck-e-Cheese’s.

- Absurd number of ADS
- Childish interface
- Goofy features
- 2nd rate layout
- Unnecessarily complex interface
- Vs. computer only supports one on one
- Dictionary???
...
The design team for this product should stick to bubble-shooters.
This game is full of bots. That’s not necessarily a problem but the games doesn’t make it clear that they are bots. They also don’t give you an option to exclude bots. Very disappointed.

There is way too much SPAM. An annoying ad pops up after every single play. Some of the ads you can wait to X out, but others make you go to the App Store no matter if you try to X out. 
Some players get multiple bingo letters every single game. 
Terrible algorithm matches you with ‘players’ that are probably just bots.
 The old Scrabble app was so much better. I’m going to have to find another word game.
The app constantly crashes.  Your scrabble game is constantly spammed with obnoxious commercials. Bring back pure scrabble without the childish crap.

You face a choice between constant interruptions from advertising or an over-priced subscription purchase. You can’t escape infantile animations and add-ons.  The programmed opponent (“Zoey”) for “play vs computer” game mode is a simpleton. This app takes a clean, classic game and makes the experience of playing it miserable.
There used to be a great classic Scrabble app. Then this abomination came along.
Too many ads. That sums up scrabble. After any and every play.
Too many ads! Having to watch a ad after every turn is annoying.  Being expected to pay $4.99 a month to get rid of the ads is ridiculous..

It has happened before that I get first place and I cannot collect the rewards. I’m disappointed. It shows as a glitch and the pop up to collect the reward disappears after it tells you, you won first place.

title.label: Charged for purchases that I didn't make!!!

content.label:
Was overcharged twice!!!
Also, have the time the "get prize" button gets hung up and doesn't work correctly

Anyone else having this problem?  Will be playing along and then screen freezes when claiming awards. Now, screen is going black. Constantly having to delete and reinstall. Not losing anything but it’s annoying.
Inviting specific friends without signing in to FB is rather difficult. Otherwise, very fun!!
Why doesn’t this app let me download, it keeps asking for a payment plan

So disappointed in this app. First, it’s Scrabble in a casino. Constant noise and flashing lights. There’s even a *constant* shh-shh-shh sound while you’re playing. WTH?!
Second, I *bought* the original Scrabble that this replaced. They took that away and want me to pay them every month not to —
Third, see an advertisement between every single turn.

title.label: Inappropriate ads for a game rated 9+

content.label: The BIGO LIVE ad is inappropriate for kids!  Seriously?  Why?  Just...why?

It serves its purpose, but the user interface is atrocious. Loaded with unnecessary achievements, bonuses and other junk no one wants in a Scrabble game. The app demands too much access to personal data. I wonder if there’s a better alternative.

They took a great game and ruined it with ads and thousands of annoying bells and whistles.  I would pay for a classic scrabble game like there used to be.  I don’t need trophies, bots challenging me, duels, puzzle path, etc. By selling the license to scopely, Hasbro ruined the game and dumbed down the experience.
So far I'm having a blast playing with Kevin Hart😁.
I think they can back off on the ads just a wee bit. To see a ad play after each and every game is a bit much.

All I wanted was to play regular ol’ Scrabble (which was possible with the Scrabble app that was “retired”).  This is Words with Friends on steroids. I don’t want to invite my friends.  I don’t want gems.  I don’t want cartoonish graphics.  I simply want Scrabble.  Alas, that doesn’t matter when developers can destroy a good thing in the name of monetization (when I would happily fork over money to play uninterrupted Scrabble instead of whatever this abortion of a game is).

This app is irritating.  It keeps crashing on me every time I level up.  I don’t care about all the junky up levels. Just want to play scrabble without having to relaunch the app very 2 turns. Please fix
Okay. I lied. It isn’t.

title.label: Bring back the original Scrabble app!

content.label: The original Scrabble app was brilliant. True to the board game and playing against the computer was a great learning experience. Scrabble Go appears to be architected for a much difference audience. The graphics are terrible and I have completely lost interest in using Scrabble Go to play Scrabble online. Bring back the features and design of the original app please!

I love playing this game, but for some reason after each advertisement the screen turned black and i have to close the app to reopen it. Please fix the issue because I don’t want to keep closing and reopening after i played my turn.

This new version of Scrabble is absolutely awful. The interface is so childish I can’t imagine anyone over 12 wouldn’t go mad.  The ads are relentless as are the enticements to pay for idiotic prizes ,Ike giant jewels.  To what end? How about just a Scrabble game with all the b.s.?

First of all, this is a really fun app. I enjoyed the scrabble and all the periphery word games and tournaments. BUT it’s a terrible battery drain. It will even drain the battery WHILE you are plugged in.  Second, there is an army of creepers and scammers on there who are definitely NOT there for the Scrabble.  Third, the cost for ad free is $8 per month, which is ridiculously steep.  I played for several days but three strikes and this app was out for me.
WAY too much extraneous garbage! I just want to play the game!!!
Crashes after or during almost every move. Have to reboot app about 100 times each game. Did they not beta test this thing at all? Worthless waste of my time.
Sweet

Not only is this the ugliest app I’ve ever had the displeasure of being forced to use, it also refuses to let me login with Apple without trying to connect to Facebook as well. Every single time. It shows that it knows who I am and am logged in through Apple, but I have to wait and manually decline that it login to my Facebook account (which doesn’t exist) every time I open it. I can only assume the worst of everyone involved in the creation and maintenance of this abomination. Shame.

Update: scammer users are rife. Scammy ads at commonplace, making the little x-close-button part of the ad image so you’re dumped into the website you want to avoid. Also, it’s the only app that doesn’t respond on the first try to my swipe up action on my iPhone X to show my open apps and switch between them. I have to swipe 3-4 times before I’m able to force close the app or switch to another open app. Reiterating: this company and app developers deserve to live in the slimiest, lowest circle of tech hell.

title.label: Ok. Way too many pop ups and annoyances

content.label: I don’t understand the many pop ups and blitz iconography. I only want to play with one friend. I do like the ability to trial a word for point tabulation. But really!!  All that other content is annoying.

The only reason I use this app is because it is the only Scrabble app for playing against a known opponent. Otherwise, this app is pure garbage and full of ads for apps after you play every game, and fake players abound. If there was another Scrabble app that just let me play games with my friends like the old Scrabble app, I would delete this app immediately. 
If the company wanted to do the right thing, they would create a paid version so that users would not have to see ads every time they play a game.
Apparently I played my first match against Kevin Hart. Boy didn’t stand a chance. I was laying hands on him the whole match.

Too much nonsense. Competitors temporarily blocked to attempt forcing one to start game with new player. Don’t want rewards and fancy tiles (annoying and boring), Scrabble is a game good enough to stand alone.
Play classic words if you want a better option

I want to add my voice to all those who complain this is a terrible app. It is everything BUT scrabble: insipid gems and jewels, absurdly unnecessary tile designs, and a riotous UI that is ugly, poorly designed, distracting, and completely ridiculous. This is a lesson in how to ruin a great classic game and should be showcased as how to NOT design a gaming app.

Read the 5 star reviews if you’re looking for fiction. The grammar and general idiocy are proof that this app’s overall score should be much, much lower.
Love this game.  Just hate when you are constantly being hit on by scammers. Please beware everyone don’t get caught up in it.
